extraDescription: Social Finance in ESDC Grants and Contributions Programs: The main objectives of the project are the following: identify opportunities for innovation within the current Government of Canada (GoC) Gs&Cs parameters under existing Treasury Board policies, guidelines and best practices on transfer payments to support social finance; identify limitations of Gs&Cs as a mechanism to support social finance; describe in detail up to 5 case studies of ESDC Gs&Cs programs that are using social finance approaches.
